anytime: My wife and I were happy for twenty years. Then we met.
Chuck Norris can kill two stones with one bird
I asked my old man if I could go ice-skating on the lake. He told me, “Wait til it gets warmer.”
Chuck Norris ordered a Big Mac at Burger King and got one.
When you come to a fork in the road, take it.
When I was born the doctor came out to the waiting room and said to my father, “I’m very sorry. We did everything we could…but he pulled through.”
I come from a stupid family. During the Civil War my great uncle fought for the west!
I usually take a two-hour nap from one to four.
Chuck Norris counted to infinity—three times.
My mother had morning sickness after I was born.
My mother never breast fed me. She told me that she only liked me as a friend.
How can you think and hit at the same time?
Chuck Norris can slam a revolving door.
morning: When I played in the sandbox the cat kept covering me up.

When Chuck Norris falls in water, 
Chuck Norris doesn't get wet. Water gets Chuck Norris.
A hooker once told me she had a headache.

I remember I was so depressed I was going to jump out a window on the tenth floor. 
They sent a priest up to talk to me. He said, “On your mark…”
So I’m ugly. I never saw anyone hit with his face.

There is no theory of evolution. 
Just a list of creatures Chuck Norris has allowed to live.
The towels were so thick there I could hardly close my suitcase.
My wife made me join a bridge club. I jump off next Tuesday.

Last week my tie caught on fire.
 Some guy tried to put it out with an ax!
afternoon:
I met the surgeon general.
 He offered me a cigarette.
If the world were perfect, it wouldn’t be.

Chuck Norris is so fast, he can run around the world
 and punch himself in the back of the head.

I knew a girl so ugly, 
I took her to the top of the Empire State building and planes started to attack her.

Chuck Norris doesn't read books. 
He stares them down until he gets the information he wants.

My marriage is on the rocks again.
 Yeah, my wife just broke up with her boyfriend.

Chuck Norris doesn't wear a watch. 
He simply decides what time it is.

I told my dentist my teeth are going yellow.
 He told me to wear a brown necktie.
evening:
as a child, I was so ugly, 
my mother used to feed me with a slingshot!

When I was born the doctor took one look at my face,
 turned me over and said, “Look, twins!”

When the Boogeyman goes to sleep every night,
 he checks his closet for Chuck Norris.
Denile, its a river in Europe.

What a childhood I had, why, 
when I took my first step, my old man tripped me!
I tell ya when I was a kid, all I knew was rejection. My yo-yo, it never came back!
I worked in a pet store and people kept asking how big I’d get.
